questions.question: Considering the overall visual presentation, what is the dominant color scheme of this food product's nutritional information panel?

Observing the structure, how is the nutritional data arranged within the rectangular panel?

Regarding the text's properties, what is the relative size of the 'Energy' value compared to other nutrient values?
Analyzing the visual hierarchy, what is the level of contrast between the text and the background?
What is the visual texture of the background of this nutritional information panel?

Considering the visual elements, are there any noticeable graphic design elements beyond text and numbers?
Analyzing the visual details, is the text alignment left, right, or centered within its respective columns?
